name: part_010
file: tmp_【#いろはにコラボ】祝！恋情詩歌リリース記念3Dコラボ配信！ [qgVPqPYGoTU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: MC segment announcing the loser of the dance challenge.
Ayame reacts to being chosen for the punishment game and tries to escape.
Fubuki explains the 'Roleplay Lyric Reading' punishment game.
Ayame draws a 'Roleplay' card from the box.
Ayame reveals her role (Samurai) and draws a lyric card.
Ayame performs the lyric reading in character as a samurai.
Fubuki and Mio react to Ayame's performance.
Transition to the 'Tanka Grand Prix' announcement segment.
Fubuki announces the winner of the 'Fubuki Award' in the Tanka Grand Prix.

subtitles.original: ということで 4と3と7ということで
subtitles.english: So, with 4, 3, and 7...

subtitles.original: やったー！弱者勝利だー！
subtitles.english: Yay! A victory for the underdog!

subtitles.original: 罰ゲームは あやめちゃんに決定！
subtitles.english: The punishment game goes to Ayame-chan!

subtitles.original: あれ？今帰ろうとしてませんでした？
subtitles.english: Wait, weren't you just about to head home?

subtitles.original: いやいやいやいや 今日のところはちょっと帰らせてもらって…
subtitles.english: No no no no, I'll just be heading home for today...

subtitles.original: いやいや帰らせませんよ！だめですよ！
subtitles.english: No no, we're not letting you go! That's not allowed!

subtitles.original: やだー！やだー！やだー！
subtitles.english: No! Stop it! Stop it!

subtitles.original: やだー！やだー！お願いします！
subtitles.english: No! No! Please!

subtitles.original: ということで 罰ゲームは…
subtitles.english: And so, the punishment game is...

subtitles.original: なりきり歌詞朗読！
subtitles.english: Roleplay Lyric Reading!

subtitles.original: なりきり歌詞朗読ってなんだ？
subtitles.english: What is "Roleplay Lyric Reading"?

subtitles.original: はい 最下位のあやめちゃんにはですね
subtitles.english: Yes, our last-place finisher Ayame-chan

subtitles.original: お題ボックスから なりきりお題と歌詞を引いてもらいます
subtitles.english: will draw a roleplay topic and lyrics from the boxes.

subtitles.original: お題になりきって 歌詞を朗読してもらう
subtitles.english: You'll roleplay the topic and read the lyrics in that character.

subtitles.original: 地獄企画となっておりますよー！
subtitles.english: It's a total hellish segment!

subtitles.original: やだー！
subtitles.english: No way!

subtitles.original: もうちょっとで稼いどけばよかったー！
subtitles.english: I should have worked a bit harder on the dance!

subtitles.original: ということで早速 お題ボックスをお願いしますー
subtitles.english: So, without further ado, let's bring out the topic box.

subtitles.original: 泣きだけでなりきりって？
subtitles.english: Just by crying, I have to roleplay?

subtitles.original: お題と じゃあまずお題ボックスから引いていただきましょうか
subtitles.english: The topic... let's have you draw from the topic box first.

subtitles.original: お題ボックス引きますよ
subtitles.english: I'm drawing from the topic box.

subtitles.original: 頼む 頼む ちょっと地獄じゃないお題お願いします
subtitles.english: Please, please, anything but a hellish topic.

subtitles.original: 先にお題を発表してもらいましょうか
subtitles.english: Let's have you announce the topic first.

subtitles.original: 頼む 頼む 頼む…
subtitles.english: Please, please, please...

subtitles.original: えっと…侍！
subtitles.english: Um... Samurai!

subtitles.original: 侍！侍！侍！
subtitles.english: Samurai! Samurai! Samurai!

subtitles.original: じゃあ侍になりきって 次歌詞ボックスから
subtitles.english: Now roleplay as a samurai. Next, from the lyric box.

subtitles.original: 侍になる…これ歌詞ですね
subtitles.english: Become a samurai... this is the lyrics.

subtitles.original: お！でも！あ！
subtitles.english: Oh! But! Ah!

subtitles.original: 「願えばいつかは晴れよと 闇に隠せし恋心」
subtitles.english: "If I pray, one day it will clear, a love hidden in darkness."

subtitles.original: これ恋情詩歌！
subtitles.english: This is Renjo Shika!

subtitles.original: ちょっと侍っぽい歌詞じゃない？これ！
subtitles.english: Aren't these lyrics kind of samurai-like?

subtitles.original: これちょっと恋情詩歌で合ってるんじゃないですか？
subtitles.english: Doesn't this fit Renjo Shika perfectly?

subtitles.original: 侍意識してやってください
subtitles.english: Please do it while keeping a samurai in mind.

subtitles.original: 侍意識って「ござる」つければいい？
subtitles.english: For a samurai vibe, should I just add "gozaru"?

subtitles.original: そんな簡単な話じゃない！そんなもんじゃないでしょう！
subtitles.english: It's not that simple! It's more than just that!

subtitles.original: ちゃんとね 心まで侍になりきってくれないと
subtitles.english: You have to truly become a samurai in your heart.

subtitles.original: 泣き侍だ 泣き侍
subtitles.english: The Crying Samurai, Crying Samurai.

subtitles.original: 頼むで 侍の心を… オッケー わかりました
subtitles.english: I'm counting on you. The heart of a samurai... okay, I understand.

subtitles.original: じゃあ あやめちゃんの侍になりきっての歌詞朗読まで 3 2 1 どうぞ！
subtitles.english: Then, Ayame-chan's lyric reading as a samurai, in 3, 2, 1, go!

subtitles.original: 願えば いつかは晴れよと
subtitles.english: If I pray, one day it will clear,

subtitles.original: 闇に隠せし 恋心
subtitles.english: a love hidden in darkness.

subtitles.original: 雲の切れ間に 光射す
subtitles.english: Light shines through the gaps in the clouds,

subtitles.original: 今 この時に
subtitles.english: at this very moment.

subtitles.original: タキ！
subtitles.english: TAKI!

subtitles.original: なんかちょっと平安時代を感じる…
subtitles.english: I feel a bit of the Heian period...

subtitles.original: えー？いいでしょ？オッケー？どうですか？上様ジャッジは？
subtitles.english: Eh~? It was good, right? Okay? What do you think? What's the staff's judgment?

subtitles.original: オッケーかな？
subtitles.english: Is it okay?

subtitles.original: オッケー！上様ジャッジオッケー！
subtitles.english: Okay! The staff's judgment is okay!

subtitles.original: やったー！渋かったよねー！良かったー
subtitles.english: Yay! It was quite grim, wasn't it! That was good.

subtitles.original: ということで いろはにダンスチャレンジでした！
subtitles.english: And so, that was the Irohani Dance Challenge!

subtitles.original: さてさて ということで ここまで色々やってきたんでござるけども…
subtitles.english: Well then, we've done various things so far...

subtitles.original: お待たせいたしました！
subtitles.english: Thank you for waiting!

subtitles.original: 皆様から募集した短歌のグランプリの発表のお時間がやってまいりました！
subtitles.english: It's time to announce the Tanka Grand Prix winners that we recruited from all of you!

subtitles.original: ついに！5000通の中から潜り抜けた猛者の…
subtitles.english: Finally! From among 5,000 entries, the best of the best...

subtitles.original: 本当にたくさん応募ありがとうございました
subtitles.english: Thank you truly for so many applications.

subtitles.original: ということで 今回ね 我々三人が選んだ
subtitles.english: So, this time, from the ones the three of us chose,

subtitles.original: フブキ賞 あやめ賞 ミオ賞の順で発表していこうと思います
subtitles.english: we'll announce the Fubuki Award, Ayame Award, and Mio Award in that order.

subtitles.original: じゃあまずフブキ賞から発表したいと思います！
subtitles.english: Then, I'll start by announcing the Fubuki Award!

subtitles.original: フブキ賞に選ばれた短歌はこちら！
subtitles.english: The Tanka chosen for the Fubuki Award is this one!

subtitles.original: あなたとね 食べるごはんが 大好きです
subtitles.english: With you, I love the meals we eat.

subtitles.original: もっちゃもっちゃ きつねのうどん
subtitles.english: Munching on kitsune udon.

subtitles.original: ハンドルネーム だんちょーさんのこちら フブキ賞とさせていただきます！
subtitles.english: This one by Handle Name: Danchou-san will be the Fubuki Award!

subtitles.original: おめでとう！おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Congratulations! Congratulations!

subtitles.original: いや これなんか「あなたとね」がすごい好き
subtitles.english: No, I really like the "With you" part.

subtitles.original: 始まる感じがすごいなんか白上らしいなって感じがして
subtitles.english: The way it starts feels very Shirakami-like.
